pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `file-magic`: Python BindingsThis library is a Python ctypes interface to `libmagic`.## InstallingYou can install `file-magic` either with: python setup.py install # or easy_install . # or pip install file-magic## Using import magic detected = magic.detect_from_filename('magic.py') print 'Detected MIME type: {}'.format(detected.mime_type) print 'Detected encoding: {}'.format(detected.encoding) print 'Detected file type name: {}'.format(detected.name)## Developing/ContributingTo run the tests: python setup.py test
